name: TEDx UIN Jakarta
description:
This site was created to handle online ticket sales for the TEDx UIN Jakarta event. Ticket sales have been integrated directly with payment gateways to make the payment process easier.

Apart from that, a dashboard website (which is used by the internal team) was also created to manage ticket purchases and the content presented on the site.

name: Logos LPSE Scraper
description:
This site was created to crawl data from 40+ LPSE sites (ministerial institutions, regional governments to BUMN) to later be displayed on this site to make it easier to find suitable procurement based on the required filters.

*Because there is no direct official access to obtain this data from their databases, crawling is carried out on each LPSE site.

name: GITC E-Letter
description:
This site was created to help facilitate the flow of creating and distributing letters at the Garuda Indonesia Training Center. There are two types of letters facilitated by this system, offering latter and confirmation letters.

Apart from facilitating the creation and distribution process, this site also facilitates to storing and reporting based on the data in the letters that have been created.

name: HIMSI Website
type: Official Site Himpunan Mahasiswa Sistem Informasi
description:
This site was created as one of the official media from HIMSI (Information Systems Student Association) UIN Jakarta to share various information related to the lectures or programs they run.

Apart from that, a website dashboard (which is used by the internal team) was also created to help manage various information that will be shared on the site.

name: Muse Youtube API
description:
This API was created to provide information about reference anime from the Muse Indonesia Youtube channel. This API is a public API and is not official so anyone can use the data for their personal project needs.

*This API will also not interfere with the traffic of viewers of the channel, because the videos are provided in iframe form from the Muse Indonesia Youtube channel.
